issue.title: Add Acero test to ensure names in the root relation of Substrain plans are retained
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18252](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18252). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, Acero retains the names in the root relation when it executes a Substrait plan but there isn't a unit test in place to prevent a future regression.
